verses.verse: And the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> together at Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> and set <S%H7931><s%> up the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%> And the land <S%H776><s%> was subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And there remained <S%H3498><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> tribes, <S%H7626><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had not yet received <S%H2505><s%> their inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> How <S%H5704><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> are you slack <S%H7503><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you?

Give <S%H3051><s%> out from among you three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> for each tribe: <S%H7626><s%> and I will send <S%H7971><s%> them, and they shall rise, <S%H6965><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> and describe <S%H3789><s%> it according <S%H6310><s%> to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of them; and they shall come <S%H935><s%> again to me.

And they shall divide <S%H2505><s%> it into seven <S%H7651><s%> parts: <S%H2506><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall abide <S%H5975><s%> in their coast <S%H1366><s%> on the south, <S%H5045><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> shall abide <S%H5975><s%> in their coasts <S%H1366><s%> on the north. <S%H6828><s%>

You shall therefore describe <S%H3789><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into seven <S%H7651><s%> parts, <S%H2506><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> the description here to me, that I may cast <S%H3384><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for you here <S%H6311><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> have no <S%H3808><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you; for the priesthood <S%H3550><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> and Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on the east, <S%H4217><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them.

And the men <S%H582><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> away: and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> them that went <S%H1980><s%> to describe <S%H3789><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Go <S%H3212><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> and describe <S%H3789><s%> it, and come <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to me, that I may here <S%H6311><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for you before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in Shiloh. <S%H7887><s%>

And the men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> and described <S%H3789><s%> it by cities <S%H5892><s%> into seven <S%H7651><s%> parts <S%H2506><s%> in a book, <S%H5612><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> again to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to the host <S%H4264><s%> at Shiloh. <S%H7887><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for them in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their divisions. <S%H4256><s%>

And the lot <S%H1486><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> and the coast <S%H1366><s%> of their lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>

And their border <S%H1366><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> was from Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side, and went <S%H5927><s%> up through the mountains <S%H2022><s%> westward; <S%H3220><s%> and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out thereof were at the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Bethaven. <S%H1007><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> toward Luz, <S%H3870><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Luz, <S%H3870><s%> which <S%H1958><s%> is Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> southward; <S%H5045><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> to Atarothadar, <S%H5853><s%> near <S%H5921><s%> the hill <S%H2022><s%> that lies on the south <S%H5045><s%> side of the nether <S%H8481><s%> Bethhoron. <S%H1032><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> was drawn <S%H8388><s%> there, and compassed <S%H5437><s%> the corner <S%H6285><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> southward, <S%H5045><s%> from the hill <S%H2022><s%> that lies before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Bethhoron <S%H1032><s%> southward; <S%H5045><s%> and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out thereof were at <S%H413><s%> Kirjathbaal, <S%H7154><s%> which <S%H1958><s%> is Kirjathjearim, <S%H7157><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> was the west <S%H3220><s%> quarter. <S%H6285><s%>

And the south <S%H5045><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> was from the end <S%H7097><s%> of Kirjathjearim, <S%H7157><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out on the west, <S%H3220><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> out to the well <S%H4599><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nephtoah: <S%H5318><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> that lies before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hinnom, <S%H2011><s%> and which <S%H834><s%> is in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of the giants <S%H7497><s%> on the north, <S%H6828><s%> and descended <S%H3381><s%> to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hinnom, <S%H2011><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Jebusi <S%H2983><s%> on the south, <S%H5045><s%> and descended <S%H3381><s%> to Enrogel, <S%H5883><s%>

And was drawn <S%H8388><s%> from the north, <S%H6828><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to Enshemesh, <S%H5885><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> Geliloth, <S%H1553><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is over <S%H5227><s%> against <S%H5227><s%> the going <S%H4608><s%> up of Adummim, <S%H131><s%> and descended <S%H3381><s%> to the stone <S%H68><s%> of Bohan <S%H932><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%>

And passed <S%H5674><s%> along toward <S%H413><s%> the side <S%H3802><s%> over <S%H4136><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> Arabah <S%H6160><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Arabah: <S%H6160><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> along to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Bethhoglah <S%H1031><s%> northward: <S%H6828><s%> and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> were at the north <S%H6828><s%> bay <S%H3956><s%> of the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> at the south <S%H5045><s%> end <S%H7097><s%> of Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> was the south <S%H5045><s%> coast. <S%H1366><s%>

And Jordan <S%H3383><s%> was the border <S%H1379><s%> of it on the east <S%H6924><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> by the coasts <S%H1367><s%> thereof round <S%H5439><s%> about, according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

Now the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> were Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> and Bethhoglah, <S%H1031><s%> and the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Keziz, <S%H7104><s%>
And Betharabah, <S%H1026><s%> and Zemaraim, <S%H6787><s%> and Bethel, <S%H1008><s%>
And Avim, <S%H5761><s%> and Pharah, <S%H6511><s%> and Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%>
And Chepharhaammonai, <S%H3726><s%> and Ophni, <S%H6078><s%> and Gaba; <S%H1387><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> and Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> and Beeroth, <S%H881><s%>
And Mizpeh, <S%H4708><s%> and Chephirah, <S%H3716><s%> and Mozah, <S%H4681><s%>
And Rekem, <S%H7552><s%> and Irpeel, <S%H3416><s%> and Taralah, <S%H8634><s%>

And Zelah, <S%H6762><s%> Eleph, <S%H507><s%> and Jebusi, <S%H2983><s%> which <S%H1958><s%> is Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> Gibeath, <S%H1394><s%> and Kirjath; <S%H7157><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6246><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
